name: Spooky House Game
description:
Return to a barren house of old where you try to unravel the mystery of your past. Refusing to leave, you need to find out what happened here, what happened to your friend.

Controls:
WASD  / Arrow Keys - Move
E - Interact / Pickup Items
Space - Advance Dialogue
Controllers are also Supported 

Credits:

Programming
Aaron Brownlee  (AaronBacon)

Music
Mark Platt  (arandomplattypus)

Concept, Writing, and Artwork
Shona Callanan (BeeBopBop)
